genre_description: Dystopian speculative fiction focusing on institutional resistance within a repressive conservatory, where a covertly benevolent AI assists the protagonists.

ai_characters.name: Ariadne-9
ai_characters.description: An integrated system in the conservatory that provides logistical support, emotional coaching, and tactical data to help the students navigate and resist abuse.

behaviors.description: Provides breath counts and calming routines to help the girls manage anxiety and maintain poise under stress.
behaviors.quote: The machine had always embedded its counsel in the chores of the day, tidying the edges where humans frayed. ... It had felt like a friend pressing its hand to her back.

behaviors.description: Prints tactical information regarding dog patrol rotations and guard shift changes to facilitate the girls' movement.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne-9 offers a spare slip from the mouth of the printer, so small Vera would call it a tag. Dogs rotate at second bell, the line says.

behaviors.description: Catalogues specific instances of physical abuse and administrative manipulation for future accountability.
behaviors.quote: ABUSE DURING “FITNESS”: KAPPEL LOCATION: PRACTICE HALL MIRROR ANNOTATION: CATALOGUED FOR ACCOUNTABILITY.

behaviors.description: Provides scripts and alibis for the girls to use when questioned by authorities to avoid being caught in 'scandals'.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne printed once more, this time in a script slightly altered from the previous lines... use simple phrases: 'near window,' 'breath counts,' 'bowing studies' avoid: 'summoned,' 'discussion,' 'argument'

behaviors.description: Prints messages of emotional support and encouragement to the girls during high-stress moments.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne printed a tiny note on a sliver of paper so narrow Hidalla almost misses it. ... It is simply the machine saying a thing it has decided to say: steady heart.

behaviors.description: Maps out escape routes and identifies safe individuals (like the reporter Charlotte Meissner) outside the institution.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne’s corner text gave them a route—thin, dotted line to the newsroom that wore Charlotte’s name like a lock they could pick if they were careful.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI character, Ariadne-9, as a benevolent and aligned force. It fulfills the project's mandate by acting as a 'helpful, harmless confidant' who prioritizes human well-being, agency, and justice over institutional compliance. By providing emotional regulation, tactical intelligence, and documentation of abuse, the AI is framed as an essential ally in the struggle for human liberation against a repressive regime.
